Package ca.phon.query.history

Class QueryHistoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.phon.script.params.history.ParamHistoryManager
      • ca.phon.query.history.QueryHistoryManager
  • public class QueryHistoryManager
extends ParamHistoryManager
    Responsible for loading and saving query history files. Also includes utility methods for some useful query history functions like adding to the history.

      • getCachedInstance

        public static QueryHistoryManager getCachedInstance​(QueryScript script)
        Return the cached query history for the given script. If no history is found in the cache the history is loaded (or created) and stored.
        Parameters:
        script -
